protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the reduction of 3-ketodihydrosphingosine (KDS) to dihydrosphingosine (DHS).

reference.reference_text: Rimokh R, Gadoux M, Bertheas MF, Berger F, Garoscio M, Deleage G, Germain D, Magaud JP: FVT-1, a novel human transcription unit affected by variant translocation t(2;18)(p11;q21) of follicular lymphoma. Blood. 1993 Jan 1;81(1):136-42.
